ImyaTweaks.Title: Turn on or off entire Features of the mod. Use the panels below to further fine tune your experience.
ImyaTweaks.Description: Switch all the Toggles to 'on' to get the full experience. By default, all modules are enabled!

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Clay Collector is present in the New World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: Unlock River Fishoil OW Building Category

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Fishoil factory is present in the New World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: Unhide River Pearl Farm NW Building Category
Unlock River Pearlfarm NW Building Category

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Pearl Farm is present in the New World. [Default = on]
Sets whether the River Gold Washer is present in the New World. [Default = on]

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable River Saw Mill in NW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Saw Mill is present in the New World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: Unhide River and Normal Power Plants NW

ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the River Power Station is present in the New World. [Default = on]

Standard.Name: construction category all NW river Slot buildings

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable Vanilla Build Menu Entries for River Slot Buildings NW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the NW River Slot Buildings apear in the normal production chains [Default = off, might not be compatibile with all mods]

ImyaExpose.ExposeID: Enable separate Menu Entry for River Slot Buildings NW
ImyaExpose.Description: Sets whether the NW River Slot Buildings apear in a separate build menu entry [Default = on, compatibile with all mods]

Standard.Name: Unlock River Buildings NW Creative Mode
